description:
The loon is an emblem of wilderness and of our Canadian lakes. The Forest Green Loonie Hoodie illustrated by artist Dan Sheridan embodies the diversity and richness of our fauna.

Made of 60% recycled polyester, 40% organic cotton it has a reduced ecological footprint while remaining soft and cozy. A great basic that will give a nice look to any outfit.
name: Hooke Loonie Hoodie  - Mens
